lines.text: [in tavern]

[to waiter while tapping a cane on table that Laurel & Hardy gypsied off a guy]
Come, come, my man!
[suddenly the top of the cane pops off and about two dozen gold coins spill out onto the table]
[Laurel & Hardy double take on this]

[smiling]
Its a good thing we got his cane.

[was singing in high, feminine voice]
Hello, Ollie.
Why, you know that you've got a nice voice.
Oh, I had a much nicer voice when I ran a nail through it. I rememb...

[sarcastically]
You ran a nail through it. Let me hear you sing that again.
Well, blow me down with an anchovy.
Did you see him chuck her under the chin?
Well, what of it?
If she was MY wife, I'd chuck her under the wagon.
Oh! My good eye!
I can gyp that gypsy any time.
Arline, haven't you forgotten something?
[he kisses his finger and touches his cheek - Arline kisses him]

[later]
Stanley, haven't you forgotten something?
[Stan smiles, kisses Ollie's cheek]

[as a giant]
Well, Here's another nice mess you've gotten me into! HMM!

[as a dwarf/whining]
But I couldn't help it! You always picked on me!
